input.label: Welcome to ODK Collect! This form showcases the different available question types (_widgets_).
input.hint:
This is a sample for introductory and debugging purposes. It is updated periodically so check "Get Blank Form" to get the latest!
Version 2019020201 adds:     - Appearance rating for range type
Version 2018102901 adds:     - Bikram Sambat calendar
Version 2018081601 adds:     - Rank widget
Version 2018051401 adds:     - File widget
Version 2018032801 adds:     - Appearance new-front (selfie) for video type
Version 2018022001 adds:     - Appearance image-map for select\_one and select\_multiple types     - Appearance new for image, audio, video types
Version 2017121301 added:     - Appearance thousands-sep for numeric types     - Range questions     - Ethiopian, coptic and islamic calendars

input.label: URL widget
input.hint: text type with url appearance and default value of http://opendatakit.org/

input.label: Ex string widget
input.hint: text type with ex:change.uw.android.BREATHCOUNT appearance (can use other external apps)

input.label: Integer widget with thousands separators
input.hint: integer type with thousands-sep appearance. This appearance can also be applied to decimal and string numbers widgets

input.label: Ex integer widget
input.hint: integer type with ex:change.uw.android.BREATHCOUNT appearance (can use other external apps)

input.label: Ex decimal widget
input.hint: decimal type with ex:change.uw.android.BREATHCOUNT appearance (can use other external apps)

range.label: Range integer widget
range.hint: range integer widget with no appearance

range.label: Range decimal widget
range.hint: range decimal widget with no appearance

range.label: Range vertical integer widget
range.hint: range integer widget with vertical appearance. This appearance can also be applied to a decimal range.

range.label: Range picker integer widget
range.hint: range integer widget with picker appearance. This appearance can also be applied to a decimal range.

range.label: Range rating integer widget
range.hint: range integer widget with rating appearance. This appearance can also be applied to a decimal range.

upload.label: Image widget without Choose button
upload.hint: image type with new appearance (can also be added with annotate appearance and on audio and video types)

upload.label: File widget
upload.hint:
file type with no appearance
WARNING: any kind of file could be uploaded including files that contain viruses or other malware. Be sure to take proper precautions when downloading files from server.

select1.label: Select one widget
select1.hint: select_one type with no appearance, 4 text choices

select1.label: Spinner widget
select1.hint: select_one type with minimal appearance, 4 text choices

select1.label: Select one autoadvance widget
select1.hint: select_one type with quick appearance, 4 text choices

select1.label: Select one search widget
select1.hint: select_one type with search appearance, 4 text choices

select1.label: Select one search widget
select1.hint: select_one type with autocomplete appearance, 4 text choices

select1.label: Grid select one widget
select1.hint: select_one type with no appearance, 4 image choices (a.jpg, b.jpg, c.jpg, d.jpg)

select1.label: Grid select one widget
select1.hint: select_one type with compact appearance, 4 image choices (a.jpg, b.jpg, c.jpg, d.jpg)

select1.label: Grid select one widget
select1.hint: select_one type with compact-2 appearance, 4 image choices (a.jpg, b.jpg, c.jpg, d.jpg)

select1.label: Grid select one widget
select1.hint: select_one type with quickcompact appearance, 4 image choices (a.jpg, b.jpg, c.jpg, d.jpg)

select1.label: Grid select one widget
select1.hint: select_one type with quickcompact-2 appearance, 4 image choices (a.jpg, b.jpg, c.jpg, d.jpg)
select_one with type image-map appearance and image body.svg

select.label: Multi select widget
select.hint: select_multiple type with no appearance, 4 text choices

select.label: Multi select autocomplete widget
select.hint: select_multiple type with autocomplete appearance, 4 text choices

select.label: Grid select multiple widget
select.hint: select_multiple type with compact appearance, 4 image choices

select.label: Grid select multiple widget
select.hint: select_multiple type with compact-2 appearance, 4 image choices

select.label: Spinner widget: select multiple
select.hint: select_multiple type with minimal appearance, 4 image choices
select_multiple type with image-map appearance and image body.svg

select1.label: Label widget
select1.hint: Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=label)

select.label: Label multi widget
select.hint: Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_multiple yes_no, appearance=label)

select1.label: List widget
select1.hint: Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)

select.label: List multi widget
select.hint: Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_multiple yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)

select1.label: List widget
select1.hint: This is a normal list widget with (type = select_one, appearance = list)

select.label: List multi widget
select.hint: This is a normal list widget with (type = select_multiple, appearance = list)

odk:rank.label: Rank widget
odk:rank.hint: rank type with no appearance, 4 text choices. Long press on a choice and drag it to change its position.

trigger.label: Trigger widget
trigger.hint: Prompts for confirmation. Useful to combine with required or relevant. (type=trigger)
